content: Karma is a funny thing and it always seems to be just around the corner, but I wonder if it only has a meaninful effect on people with a conscience? Either way, seems to me there is a city on the east coast of this country where a shit ton of karma is building up, just hope I’m around to see the smug wiped off their faces… Thank you for the story and sorry to hear about your job situation, Kristin. Hope you’re back at it soonest!!😊
